name: Bonafide Chicken Slime
description:
As a chicken searching for gold, you encounter some not so friendly slimes who seek to deter you from your quest. Will you come out victorious, or wind up being their next meal?

Controls
  • Move: WASD / arrow keys
  • Shoot Eggs: Left mouse button (hold down to autofire)
Credits
  • Trevor Mitchell: Programmer
  • Tavin Reeves: Artist
  • John Kuligowski: Programmer
  • Joe Markelon: Soundtrack
